This article contains statistics about the [[COVID-19 pandemic in India]]. [[COVID-19]] cases, deaths, recoveries, and other statistics are shown in nationwide and [[States and union territories of India|regional]] maps and graphs.

== Maps ==
{{gallery
| File:India COVID-19 confirmed cases map.svg|Total Confirmed cases by state and union territory
| File:India COVID-19 cases density map.svg|Confirmed cases per million population by state and union territory
| File:India COVID-19 active cases map.svg|Active cases by state and union territory
| File:India COVID-19 deaths per million map.png|Deaths per million population by state and union territory
| File:India COVID-19 deaths map.svg|Deaths by state and union territory
| File:India COVID-19 recoveries map.png|Recoveries per million population by state and union territory
}}

=== Interactive maps ===
{{Image frame
|align=left
|caption=Interactive map of confirmed COVID-19 deaths in India.<br>Click the play button in the top left to interact with the map.<br>Hover over the regions for values.
|content=
{{col-begin}}
{{col-2}}
{{COVID-19 pandemic interactive maps/India
|data-template = Template:COVID-19 pandemic interactive maps/India/India deaths by region
|legend-title = Deaths
|color-ramp-type = sqrt
|domain-upper-value = 20000
|scale=0.75
}}
{{col-2}}
{{COVID-19 pandemic interactive maps/India
|color-ramp-type=linear
|data-template=Template:COVID-19 pandemic interactive maps/India/India deaths by region
|domain-upper-value=250
|legend-title=Deaths per million population
|per-capita=1000000
|scale=0.75
}}
{{col-end}}
}}

== Charts ==

=== Total confirmed cases, active cases, recoveries and deaths ===

</center>

|Logarithmic scale}}
</div>

  | colors = #FA9703, #975B02
}}
</div>

<small>'''Notes:''' 
* On 17 June, 1,672 backlogged deaths from Maharashtra and Delhi were added taking reported daily deaths to 2,003 on that day.<ref>{{Cite web|date=2020-06-17|title=India's death toll soars past 10K, backlog deaths raise count by 437 in Delhi, 1,409 in Maharashtra|url=https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/india-s-death-toll-soars-past-10k-backlog-deaths-raise-count-by-437-in-delhi-1-409-in-maharashtra/story-9GNbe7iMBKLsiHtByjRKCJ.html|access-date=2020-06-17|website=Hindustan Times|language=en}}</ref>
* On 23 July, Tamil Nadu reported 528 deaths including backlogged deaths, taking reported daily deaths to 1,129<ref>{{Cite web|date=2020-07-23|title=45,720 new cases in 24 hrs, 13% positivity, single-day toll 1,129 after Tamil Nadu update|url=https://theprint.in/health/45720-new-cases-in-24-hrs-13-positivity-single-day-toll-1129-after-tamil-nadu-update/466882/|access-date=2020-08-05|website=The Print|language=en}}</ref></small>
</div>
<section end="Statistics"/>

  | y2 = <!-- 7-day average new case/active case--> 12.50, 14.81, 15.78, 14.81, 17.44, 15.96, 17.16, 15.79, 14.68, 17.90, 23.81, 20.96, 25.22, 23.53, 24.59, 24.51, 22.93, 18.14, 17.74, 16.75, 16.90, === Case fatality rate ===
The trend of [[case fatality rate]] for COVID-19 from 12 March, the day first death in the country was recorded.<ref name="death1">{{cite web |title=India's first coronavirus death is confirmed in Karnataka |url=https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/india-s-first-coronavirus-death-in-karnataka-confirmed/story-2ZJ6IuxJ38EiGndBq5pfHO.html |website=Hindustan Times  |date=12 March 2020|access-date=27 March 2020}}</ref>

<div class='toccolours' style="display:inline-block; width:950px; margin:1em 0;">
<center>
{{legend inline|#cd5c5c|Case fatality rate}}
</center>
{{Graph:Chart <!-- Formula = Total deaths till date/Total cases till date*100 -->
  | width      = 900
  | height     = 300
  | xAxisTitle = Date
  | yAxisTitle = Percentage
  | xAxisAngle = -45
  | type       = line
  | xType      = date
  | xGrid      =
  | yGrid      =
  | x = 2020-03-12, 2020-03-13, 2020-03-14, 2020-03-15, 2020-03-16, 2020-03-17, 2020-03-18, 2020-03-19, 2020-03-20, 2020-03-21, 2020-03-22, 2020-03-23, 2020-03-24, 2020-03-25, 2020-03-26, 2020-03-27, <section end="Test_Statistics"/>

===Positive sampling rate===
<div class='toccolours' style="display:inline-block; width:950px; margin:1em 0;">
<center>
{{legend inline|#FA9703|Daily positive sampling ratio}}
{{legend inline|#975B02|Total positive sampling ratio}}
</center>
{{Graph:Chart <!-- Formula = confirmed cases/samples tested -->
  | width = 850
  | height = 400
  | xAxisTitle = Date
  | yAxisTitle = Positive
  | xAxisAngle = -45
  | type = line
  | xType = date
  | yAxisFormat = %
  | xGrid =
  | yGrid =
  | x = 2020-03-19, 2020-03-20, 2020-03-21, 2020-03-22, 2020-03-23, 2020-03-24, 2020-03-25, 2020-03-27, 2020-03-29, 2020-03-30, 2020-03-31, 2020-04-01, 2020-04-02, 2020-04-03, 2020-04-04, 2020-04-05,
